Quake Wii

Requirements

  • A Wii.
  • Twilight Hack, The Homebrew Channel or some other way of running programs from SD Card.

Installation

  1. Copy the ID1 folder to the root of your SD Card.
  2. Copy Quake's PAK0.PAK (and PAK1.PAK if you own the full version) into the ID1 folder on your SD Card.
  3. Insert the SD Card into the Wii front SD slot.
  4. Launch Quake.dol or Quake.elf using your method of choice.

Credits

  • Original game by id Software.
  • GameCube conversion by Peter Mackay.
  • GameCube version testing by eke, org and plootid.
  • Wii version by Eluan Miranda

Contact

You can report bugs or suggestions using the project's issue tracker. Please make sure to check the existing issues before adding new ones.

Source code

The original Quake code was released under the GNU General Public License (GPL). Quake GameCube's source code is available at the Google project page.
